对于线性分类问题，若数据是线性可分的，支持向量机计算支持向量使得硬间隔最大化；当数据是线性不可分时，支持向量机引入松弛变量，计算支持向量使的软间隔最大化。

对于非线性分类问题，支持向量机引入核函数后求解支持向量。

## 硬间隔和软间隔

---------------------

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.align="center", fig.width=6, fig.height=4}
par(mar = c(.5, .5, .5, .5))
plot.new()
shape::Arrows(0, 0, 0, 1.2, arr.type = "triangle", arr.length = 0.3, arr.width = 0.1)
shape::Arrows(0, 0, 1, 0, arr.type = "triangle", arr.length = 0.3, arr.width = 0.1)

set.seed(2414)

w <- -0.8
b <- 1
margin <- 0.2
l <- function(x, w, b, jitter = c("none", "up", "down")) {
  switch (jitter,
    "none" = w * x + b,
    "up" = w * x + b + runif(length(x), 0, 1.2 - w * x - b),
    "down" = w * x + b - runif(length(x), 0, w * x + b)
  )
}

abline(b, w)
abline(b + margin, w, lty = 2)
abline(b - margin, w, lty = 2)

x <- runif(8)
# points(x, rep(0.5, length(x)), pch = 2)
y <- l(x, w, b + margin, "up")
points(x, y, pch = 2)

x <- runif(2)
y <- l(x, w, b + margin, "none")
points(x, y, pch = 2)


x <- runif(8)
y <- l(x, w, b - margin, "down")
points(x, y, pch = 3)

x <- runif(2)
y <- l(x, w, b - margin, "none")
points(x, y, pch = 3)

box(col = "#dcdcdc", which = "outer")

```
